Crate rerun::external::re_data_ui

Expand description

Rerun Data Ui

This crate provides ui elements for Rerun component data for the Rerun Viewer.

Modules

  • item_ui
    Basic ui elements & interaction for most re_viewer_context::Item.

Structs

  • EntityComponentWithInstances
    All the values of a specific re_log_types::ComponentPath.

Traits

  • DataUi
    Types implementing DataUi can display themselves in an egui::Ui.
  • EntityDataUi
    Similar to DataUi, but for data that is related to an entity (e.g. a component).

Functions

  • add_to_registry
    Registers how to show a given component in the ui.
  • annotations
  • create_component_ui_registry
  • image_meaning_for_entity
  • is_component_visible_in_ui
    Show this component in the UI.
  • show_zoomed_image_region
    meter: iff this is a depth map, how long is one meter?
  • show_zoomed_image_region_area_outline
  • table_for_verbosity
    Build an egui table and configure it for the given verbosity.
  • tensor_summary_ui_grid_contents
  • ui_visible_components
    Filter out components that should not be shown in the UI, and order the other components in a cosnsiten way.
